scripts.start: cross-env SITECORE_API_HOST=https://jsssandbox.sc SITECORE_API_KEY=C9A1C404-231B-4DCE-882F-77757885EEA1 JSS_EDITING_SECRET=jsseditgeheim PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000/ func start --port 3000
